column2: Maropost India Private Limited (Canada s 4th fastest growing tech company). Headquartered in Downtown Toronto ,  Canada.   Global Presence: India (Mohali) US (New York)   Maropost is the leading provider of on - demand email and digital marketing solutions. Our Software as a Service Marketing Cloud technology provides organizations a single platform to connect with customers via marketing automation ,  mass and transactional email ,  social media ,  mobile messaging ,  landing pages ,  and more.    Salary offered: 4.00 LPA  -  5.50 LPA (Based on your experience ,  previous job role ,  performance in the interview)    Benefits: Provident Fund (if applicable) Free Medical insurance Accidental insurance Free Gym    Corporate parties / events etc.   For more details log on to www.maropost.com    JOB ROLE:    The Deliverability Analyst will assist Maropost with account and project management for consulting engagements. This role performs technical investigations into client email systems ,  reviews messages sent by clients ,  and makes recommendations based on analysis of the client s email programs. External communication with clients will be primarily via telephone and email.   Schedule Requirements    This requires you to operate in EST - Zone Business Hours.   Key Responsibilities    Getting Maropost customers onboard by completing their required DNS setup ,  assigning the required IPs.    Creating a warm - up plan for the customer & c ollecting data from customers related to email delivery.    Reviewing data and conducting email delivery analysis.    Educating clients about best practices related to email sending ,  address collection ,  list management ,  and other email program issues.    Making clear recommendations and explaining potential risks to clients to help them achieve business goals while maximizing deliverability.    Generating and reviewing reports related to deliverability - focused metrics such as bounce rates ,  open rates ,  complaints ,  etc.    Investigating and addressing email delivery problems by engaging directly with relevant ISP abuse desks ,  email blacklists ,  and anti - spam technology providers.   Preferred Skill - set    A basic understanding of email end - to - end delivery including IP addresses ,  DNS ,  SMTP ,  authentication and email headers    Understanding of best practices for sending bulk email    Experience with outbound or inbound email deliverability    ISP Relations ,  FBL signups ,  whitelisting ,  email block resolution    Email filtering and blacklisting policies at ISPs ,  filtering companies ,  and block - lists    Data analysis and presentation    Experience with Word / Pages and Excel / Numbers

column2: The People Ops Specialist will work on a wide variety of tasks and projects that are critical to the success of the People Ops organization. Some of these tasks and projects include being the first touch point for inquiries from our internal team members, provisioning platform access (adding, removing and changing access as needed), auditing people ops processes, measuring the efficacy of current processes and more.          General Responsibilities Include:           Respond to inquiries from internal team members on various topics, providing quick and quality solutions/advice         Manage access requests to all company platforms, as well as solely responsible for ensuring all exited team members access has been removed on time         Audit current People Ops processes to ensure 100% compliance by the team, and identify solutions for improving the process         Ensure 100% data integrity across all platforms, and assist with managing People Ops platforms such as the HRIS system and performance management system         Manage email groups and groups in other platforms such as Confluence and Slack         Complete regular security audits of all platforms to ensure there are no individuals with the incorrect access          Opportunity to assist other members of the People Ops team with miscellaneous projects and tasks as needed           What a Successful 90 Day Review Looks Like         You ve received a score of 3 for      meeting     our exceedingly high expectations throughout this review cycle. Here are several things you ve accomplished in your first 90 days that resulted in this score:            You ramped up quickly, taking over the management of our internal data systems completely by day 15, created the definition of data integrity and the method of measuring data integrity by day 30, and had completed your first data integrity audit by day 35. From here, you provided the results and expected deliverables to the team, and were able to get all deliverables actioned by day 45, resulting in a data integrity score of 95%.          You currently maintain a personal average satisfaction rating of 4.5/5 for the quality and timeliness of responses to our internal team members, and have raised the overall feedback participation from an average of 41% to 65% in your first 90 days here.          Through platform audits that you completed within your first 30 days, there were no instances where an exited team member had not been removed/deactivated from a platform. Additionally, you followed clues in your weekly platform audits that resulted in     two      process changes to the way we provision platform access.         You proactively identified at least      two      security risks through the platform audits and defect hunts you ve conducted, and have implemented a corresponding SMART plan to address each of them.          You increased the speed of our team response time to platform access requests by 10%, and used the clues from those access requests to develop      at least one WBD      that addressed a root problem with our company access.          You developed a new, scalable system for organizing our groups in Confluence, Gmail and Slack, and created a digital directory that synchronized all this data into one place.             Need to Have Experience:         At least 2 years experience working in a People Operations (or related) capacity         Project management experience, specifically being the driver of time-sensitive and confidential projects          Incredibly organized, detail-oriented, and punctual         Proficiency with Microsoft and/or Google Drive products like Word/Docs, Excel/Sheets, and Slides/Presentation         Ability to learn new technology systems quickly          Nice to Have Experience:         Experience working with employment documents, such as offer letters, consulting agreements, confidentiality agreements, etc.         Exposure to employment law and general employment best practices         Experience working cross-culturally and with diverse, global teams         Experience with US visa programs management         HR Certification like SPHR or equivalent

Role Overview           The Development Manager    (QA Project Manager)    will be responsible for maintaining the proper course of actions and services around functionality testing planning, execution, and reporting on one or more projects under supervision. The Development Manager is tasked with coordinating a group of Associate Development Managers or QA Project Leads handling key testing activities, is actively involved in process improvement initiatives and improve on efficiency and level of quality while keeping a strong partnership and open communication lines with all partners. Development Manager is also the key user of data and its analysis and bring it into practice for data driven decisions.           Responsibilities:             Responsible for managing the planning, execution, and reporting processes of QV team.             Partner closely with leads on other teams (Game Development, Compliance, Certification, Localisation) and be collaborating with the project owner to ensure the teams are working as efficiently as possible.              Assure timely completion of testing for projects as well as comprehensive bug tracking and reporting.             Hire, onboard and train the test team. Monitor and evaluate tester/analyst performance and take corrective actions as and when needed.             Be pro-active and anticipate potential problems and future needs and take necessary actions to address them or raise concerns to the management team.             Measure and report on quality assurance metrics on a regular basis.             Identify a strategy for maintaining consistent QA environments providing as much up time for testing as possible.             Uphold the importance of core values and culture by leading team building events and building strong communication amongst QA team members.             Utilizes metrics and analytics to anticipate future issues affecting the health or quality of the game, and to some extent, the team.             Manages shifts as the team work in a geographical distributed environment.             Skills and Experience:             6+ years experience in Quality Assurance or comparable development experience             1-2 years of experience in project planning in testing or dev environments, and managing a team             Experience with      various project management and bug tracking tools             Experience in working on automation tools and other cost-effective testing methodologies             Experience in leveraging product quality data for generating meaningful metrics visualization              Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written             Agile experience             Desirable:             PMP certification              Games industry experience

column2: In this role you will ensure all Service Level Agreements are adhered to and provide the client stakeholders with a high-quality service compliant with controls, and drive continuous improvement and transformation.          You will promote teamwork, provide employees with coaching and feedback.          You will network with other functions and will interact with leadership and manage the relationship on matters pertaining to the Accounts Receivable process.                  As the Operations Leader you will be expected to:                Oversee the overall performance of a 100+ members in the accounts receivable team and ensure all SLAs and KPIs are met in accordance to the agreement.              Monitor and track timely billing, cash application, reconciliation and month end close procedures.            Supervise the regional collections team in organization, partner with business and regional finance stakeholders and ensure collection targets are met.            Prepare the weekly/monthly KPI reports and provide insights on collection trend and progress, proactively highlight challenges/risks and suggest innovative solutions.            Continuously coach and train the collections team, review performance and provide guidance.            Develop the monthly performance dashboard and other AR metrics as requested by the stakeholders, actively participate in the monthly reviews with finance heads.            Ensure adherence to collection policy and initiate appropriate actions to ensure full compliance to the AR policy.            Continuously evaluate the collections process and recommend best practices & approach including other alternatives.            Evaluate and recommend proper accounting policies and procedures for O2C.            Closely engage with business and finance stakeholders to agree on actions required to clear aged receivables.            Continuously challenge the existing process and strongly recommend efficient ways of performing.            Re-engineer the AR process, improve cash flow and reduce aged receivables.            Develop the continuous improvement framework and drive the CI culture among employees.            Engage with key personnel in the regions and build a trusting relationship, provide leadership support in coordinating with organization team and the regions.            Effectively collaborate and communicate with the stakeholders and ensure client satisfaction.            Build a high performing team, coordinate with HR in hiring the right resources and oversee onboarding of resources.            Provide regular insight to the employees on regional performance, business requirements and set the right performance expectations.            Drive process compliance across the AR function and establish a method to monitor and capture deviations to standard processes.            Support internal and external audits, be the bridge between auditors and delivery teams. Coordinate action plans and closure of actions.                    Important                      The candidate will be responsible for the AR function within Financial Shared Service, scope includes Invoicing, cash application, collections and dispute resolution.          Develop strong relationship and facilitate close interaction between the receivables team and key stakeholders in the organization.                      Requirements          Ideal candidate:                        Extensive experience and a thorough understanding of accounts receivable in a Shared Services context. 15 to 20 years overall experience with the majority being in O2C with exposure to the SAP environment.                      At least 8-12 years' experience working as AR Leader within Finance Operations / Shared Services, with proven capability to lead, develop and motivate a team and create a best-in-class shared services department.

column2: About Us  Moder formerly known as Archwell Operations is a part of Archwell Holdings founded in 2017. We are a tech forward outsourcing company specialising in supporting the US Mortgage, Insurance, and Banking industries. We specialize in end-to[1]end component-based outsourcing, managing one-off projects to becoming an extension of the customer service or operations team. Our team is built on industry expertise and provides the traction clients need to grow their company. Equipped with diverse tools, platforms, solutions, and services we strive to work towards our mission to positively impact the financial health of companies by powering in-house processes using top talent, workflow best practices, and progressive technology . Job Overview:  Title examiner who is keen to learn and who has extensive experience in US Title Examining for full search process. The position requires the examiner to review title documents, assess the open liens/judgment and other liabilities that may affect the title to the property.      Roles & Responsibilities Should have good understanding of Title Search knowledge. For ex: Limited search, Netro-Online Search, Full Search, Title Examiners, Two Owner Search, Current owner search.  Should have experience in performing nationwide search with high level of expertise. column2: Develop a detailed understanding of how the tables, and 450 stored procedures and .NET services work together to drive the solution. column1: Hiring Medical Billers & Payment Posters -EDHM/UB04/Hospital Billing
column2: HealthRecon Connect provides technology-enabled Revenue Cycle Management (RCM) solutions to US healthcare providers. We leverage over 30 years of deep domain expertise, cutting-edge analytics as well as machine learning, Artificial Intelligence and Automated workflows to help improve cashflow, patient outcomes and enable peace of mind for our clients.   At HealthRecon Connect (HRC), we hold ourselves accountable for setting and maintaining high standards. Day after day, we passionately strive for high achievement; for customer delight and thrive on the challenge of high expectations and commitment to excel.   We are looking for team members with RCM experience specifically in the area of  Hospital Emergency Department/Hospital Medicine     Billing Associate (Hospital Emergency Department/Hospital Medicine)/UB04/Hospital Billing/Institutional Billing Role Profile Production to be carried out efficiently according to the daily production targets specified by management Update the allocated batches in the charge tracker accurately Download/ verify correspondences related to billing Ensure to fix and refile unbilled, and rejections to the carrier on timely manner Enter the charge entries or demo entries according to the given TAT Perform daily/weekly scanned and electronic charge reconciliation of respective clients Ensure QA reports are reviewed, fixed and responded back to the QA teams within 24 hours Ensure to responded back to all internal e-mails within the shift time Enforce company regulatory standards to ensure the area of responsibility is in compliance with HIPPA and ISO standards Daily and Weekly assigned reports to be shared within the given timelines Ensure to update SOPs in a timely manner and according to the required level Conduct random QA on a percentage decided by the management Perform QA daily if allocated and ensure to share QA reports with the relevant personnel Ensure QA batch transmission is done on a daily basis Production quality to be maintained at 98% accuracy or greater Share Daily and Weekly assigned reports within given timelines Maintain 100% accuracy in updating the productivity tracker Conduct training to newcomers on the job specific functions   Cash Posting Associate (Hospital Emergency Department/Hospital Medicine)/UB04/Hospital Billing/Institutional Billing Role Profile Production to be carried out efficiently according to the daily production targets specified by management Update payment details in the internal reconciliation tracker Download payment batches (EOB, ERA, EFT and other payment correspondences) from respective images sources Enter the payment processing is done according to the given TAT Ensure insurance companies reimbursing right allowable amounts for the submitted charges Perform daily/weekly/monthly scanned and electronic payment reconciliation of respective clients Ensure QA reports are reviewed, fixed and responded back to the QA teams within 24 hours Ensure to responded back to all internal e-mails within the shift time Enforce company regulatory standards to ensure the area of responsibility is in compliance with HIPPA and ISO standards Daily and Weekly assigned reports to be shared within the given timelines Ensure to update SOPs in a timely manner and according to the required level Conduct random QA on a percentage decided by the management Perform QA daily if allocated and ensure to share QA reports with the relevant personnel Ensure QA batch transmission is done on a daily basis Production quality to be maintained at 98% accuracy or greater Share Daily and Weekly assigned reports within given timelines Conduct training to newcomers on the job specific functions   Person Profile    Bachelors degree in Finance, Healthcare, Business, or related field At least 3 years RCM experience with at least 2 years in Hospital Medical Billing experience Specific experience in Hospital RCM with exposure to Emergency Department/Hospital Medicine Understanding of DRG, Revenue and Condition codes. Detailed knowledge and expertise across the entire patient revenue cycle continuum Passion for solving problems Ability to work with MS Office package Good written and verbal communication skills Ability to work under pressure Tenacity   Work Week: Monday to Friday   Shift: Day   Other Features: Full-time US calendar applicable   Please send us your CV to careers@healthreconconnect.com with the subject line Billing Associate HealthRecon Connect is an equal opportunity employer.

column2: Position -  Financial,  Data Modelling & Research Analyst    Aboiut ePaisa  ePaisa is a SaaS based Point of Sale (POS) which provides tools to businesses of all sizes to help run and grow from Entrepreneur to Enterprise. These tools solve their pain points and help them organize their day to day business effectively and efficiently. ePaisa iOS and Android app enables business to take care of their billing,  manage inventory,  accept all forms of payments (cards,  wallets,  cash,  Bitcoins),  reach out to customers and earn more to grow their business. Thousands of retailers,  QSRs,  exhibitors,  high street stores and home delivery companies across India are currently advancing their business using ePaisa. Founded in 2012,  with offices in Mumbai and New Delhi,  ePaisa is driven by commerce enablement and is working to liberate commerce -  levelling the playing field for merchants of all sizes. Our team members are carefully selected and the approach helps nurture entrepreneurship and great ideas into our solutions. We seek out multiple professionals who thrive in a congenial,  start up focused atmosphere. Our team is friendly,  focused,  and a tad obsessive. The kind of people you ll love working with. ePaisa is seeking a Senior Partnership Manager who has the skill to work with existing and future ePaisa partners which include Banks,  Government Corporate,  Large Customers and Distributors to name a few.    Successful candidates will be responsible for:  Creating and analysing financial models effects and trends of pricing discounts and building cash flows for valuation and business financing for start- up's and incubated companies. column1: Claims Underwriter Required at Policy Bazaar II CTC Upto 4.5 LPA
column2: To fix up the interview schedule, please connect Ms.   Shikha Sharma-87000-43971(11am-5pm) Salary: Maximum 4.50 LPA Job Summary: Policy Bazaar, a leading insurance aggregator, is seeking experienced and detail-oriented Claims Underwriters to join our dynamic team in Gurgaon. As a Claims Underwriter, you will be responsible for reviewing and verifying documentation related to insurance claims, ensuring accuracy, and facilitating efficient claim processing. This role requires excellent communication skills, attention to detail, and a good understanding of document verification procedures. Responsibilities: Conduct thorough verification of claim documents, including Aadhar card, PAN card, driving license, and other relevant documents, ensuring compliance with company policies and regulatory requirements. Assess and analyze claims data to determine eligibility, coverage, and authenticity of the claims submitted. Review insurance policies and contracts to ascertain coverage and evaluate potential risks. Collaborate with the claims processing team and other relevant departments to resolve discrepancies or issues in the claim documentation. Communicate with claimants, insurance agents, and other stakeholders to gather additional information and clarify discrepancies if needed, using clear and professional email communication and verbal skills. Maintain accurate records of claims processing and documentation for future reference and audits. Adhere to established guidelines, protocols, and turnaround times to ensure efficient claims processing. Keep up-to-date with industry trends, changes in insurance policies, and regulatory requirements related to claims underwriting. Contribute to process improvement initiatives to enhance efficiency and customer satisfaction. Ensure strict adherence to data privacy and security measures while handling sensitive customer information. Qualifications and Requirements: Previous experience in claims processing, documentation check, or underwriting is essential. Strong understanding of document verification procedures, including but not limited to Aadhar card, PAN card, and driving license. Excellent email writing and verbal communication skills to effectively interact with stakeholders. Detail-oriented and ability to analyze information accurately. Comfortable working on a 6-day workweek with rotational week-offs. Must be fully vaccinated against communicable diseases to ensure a safe working environment. Salary and Benefits: Salary: Maximum 4.50 LPA Additional benefits and incentives as per company policies. Interview and Work Location:  Sector 44, Gurgaon Interview Timings:  10 AM till 5 PM Best of Luck!

column2: Case Study 1: Lyft Toledo Case         Case Interview + preliminary behavioral interview with a member of the Product Team           We will always give you the chance to ask questions during this stage           Case Study 2: Working Backwards Document Case           This is based on a scenario within our marketplace           Working Backwards Document Review with a member of the Product Team          Meet with Head of Product or Head of Strategy and Operations (George Markoulakis or Wyatt Amaral)         Meet with President / COO (Bo Lu)         In your first 30 days you ll:         Talk to customers, understand their problems, and surface issues we weren t devoting enough attention to         Embed within an operational team and solve customer problems         Write weekly write-ups and other documentation to keep others up to date with your work         In your first 90 days you ll:         Write a project plan to solve a major issue affecting many customers         Broadcast the plan to relevant stakeholders, get their feedback, and adjust it         Execute on the plan and report findings to the executive team         You can t be successful here if you:         Don t enjoy talking to customers. We talk to our customers day in and day out. Our customer conversations are an integral part of how we make decisions.         Don t enjoy writing. We write a lot, and we hold our writing to a high standard. If you aren t comfortable being scrutinized on not only the content but the clarity of your writing week over week, our culture won t be a good fit for you.         Want to know what to do. In your role you ll be expected to actively seek out problems for customers and dig into any underlying issues. You will have to use your judgment to bring clarity to it.          Don t like working with data or math. As a marketplace company, we have a highly quantitative culture. Our language is steeped in numbers.         Don t want an intellectual challenge. The problems we face are novel and challenging, and we expect people to solve them quickly. If you aren t looking for an intellectual challenge in your role, this won t be a good fit.

column2: Role & responsibilities     General Description: The Contract Services team is responsible for managing the contract lifecycle post-execution on behalf of clients who utilize TEOCOs Contract Management platform. This overall responsibility includes processing contracts from intake, extraction, analysis, the development or update of appropriate rate tables and ordering references, through approval and posting. In the performance of their duties, the Contract Specialist will support the team and specifically the Contract Analyst using several workflow management, database, and other TEOCO custom tools to process contracts accurately and on- time. The Contract Specialist will serve as part of a team, coordinating with other team members and accepting overflow work assignments as directed by the Team Lead. -Utilize workflow management, database software, and other business applications to process a high volume of contracts including master service agreements, amendments, re-terms, service orders, and deselect contracts for various wholesale and retail telecommunications services. -Perform data transformations as necessary and ensure data is properly transferred from original source contract documents to TEOCOs Contract Management platform. -Update and maintain databases and systems to include ticket status changes and information updates.  -Communicate and coordinate solutions with clients and other team members involved in the contract processing lifecycle through service tickets, email and conference calls.  -Ensure compliance with existing processes and procedures, including quality control standards and service level agreements with all work performed. -Training will be provided for all TEOCO and client systems and tools used in the contract lifecycle process. Preferred candidate profile     Essential: Intermediate Excel, data entry and analytical skills. 4-yr degree from a college, technical school or business school. 2+ years experience working with contracts and/or procurement, spreadsheets and database systems. Knowledge of contract terms and conditions, processes, and contract formats. Proficiency in the use of all Microsoft Office applications. Excellent attention to detail, organizational, and documentation skills. Able to learn and employ new software quickly.  Desirable:  : Telecom transport network and/or telecom contract knowledge beneficial, but not required if candidate has suitable experience with contracts from another industry

column2: Diverse Lynx is looking for QBE_Azure Databricks_B1/B2/_Hyderabad to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey.As a Data Engineer specializing in Azure Databricks at QBE (an abbreviation for the organization), you will be responsible for designing, building, and maintaining data processing pipelines and solutions on the Azure Databricks platform. Your role involves collaborating with cross-functional teams, implementing data engineering best practices, and ensuring the efficiency and reliability of data workflows.     Responsibilities : Data Pipeline Development : Design and implement end-to-end data processing pipelines using Azure Databricks.Develop and optimize ETL processes to transform and load data from diverse sources.Data Modeling : Design and implement data models to support analytical and reporting requirements.Ensure data models adhere to best practices for scalability and performance.Azure Databricks Development : Leverage Azure Databricks features and capabilities for data exploration, analysis, and processing.Implement and optimize Spark jobs to handle large-scale data processing.Data Integration : Integrate data from various sources, including on-premises and cloud-based systems.     Ensure seamless and efficient data flow between different components of the data architecture.Performance Optimization : Identify and address performance bottlenecks in data processing and storage.Implement caching, partitioning, and other optimization techniques for improved efficiency.Data Quality and Governance : Implement data quality checks and validations within data pipelines.Adhere to data governance standards and ensure compliance with data security policies.     Collaboration : Collaborate with data scientists, analysts, and other stakeholders to understand data requirements.Work closely with cross-functional teams to integrate data solutions into business processes.Monitoring and Troubleshooting : Set up monitoring tools and alerts to track the performance of data pipelines.Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to data processing and pipeline failures.     Documentation : Create and maintain comprehensive technical documentation for data pipelines, processes, and architecture.Document best practices and guidelines for data engineering on Azure Databricks.Continuous Learning : Stay informed about the latest developments in Azure Databricks and related technologies.Proactively seek opportunities for skill enhancement and professional development.

As Team Lead, Growth Initiatives, spectrum of responsibilities will include championing outreach, support and content marketing. The ideal candidate should be exposed to the startup culture and be willing to work in a high pressure environment with ambiguous requirements.  Product culture At Airwoot, we believe in strong team, solid vision and consistent execution. One dimension which binds these characteristics is to have a strong product culture. A strong product culture means that the team understands the importance of continuous execution and learning.       We understand the need to break things in order to learn, but we break them faster and mitigate the risks.     We understand the need for continuous innovation.     We know that great products are the result of team collaboration.     We respect and value our designers and engineers.     We understand the power of motivated product team and engineering excellence.  Summary and Requirements Apart from a proven track record, the candidate should have a minimum of 4 yrs of experience with:     Expertise in developing B2B marketing content and writing data driven blogs.     Ability to understand, conceptualize, plan and execute B2B marketing.     Deep understanding of the 3 pillars of B2B marketing - Acquisition(segmentation & funnel) and Retention.     Plan and execute Community Outreach programs. Reach out into the community and promote airwoot's technology through various channels such as Blogs, Linkedin, Quora, Facebook andTwitter.     Execute product support, client onbaording     Build knowledge base so that airwoot's clients and their agents can feed off it. column2: Description        The Medicare Compliance Specialist will report to the Compliance Supervisor and will assist with the implementation of the Medicare Compliance Plan including but not limited to the sales agent oversight process and complaints investigation process.        ESSENTIAL RESPONSIBILITIES:        With supervision from the Medicare Compliance Supervisor, execute the tasks associated with the complaint investigation process. These tasks include but are not limited to, the retrieval of written agent statements, responding to Carrier requests, conducting a thorough investigation of grievances identifying any compliance concerns, maintaining accurate documentation and drafting Complaint investigation reports outlining identified concerns.      Track complaints in the Medicare Compliance database and link all relevant documents. Assist the Supervisor with internal reporting of complaints; populating reports that demonstrate complaint volume, complaint investigation statuses and outcomes.      With supervision from the Medicare Compliance Supervisor, execute compliance monitoring (CM) assessments of sales agents, document results within established repository in accordance with defined departmental policies and procedures, report CM Assessment results to the Medicare Compliance Supervisor.      Works with call center business units to increase awareness of the importance of the compliance, FWA plans and the Code of Conduct.      Maintain up-to-date knowledge of all Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) regulations        BASIC QUALIFICATIONS:        2 years prior experience at a Medicare Advantage Organization or Prescription Drug plan Sponsor (prior experience with Appeals and Grievances strongly preferred).        PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:          BA/BS Degree      Detail oriented with good organizational, written and verbal communication skills.      Ability to work in a fast paced environment and effectively prioritize work to meet internal and external deadlines.      Proficiency in Microsoft applications (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, SharePoint and Outlook).

column2: Ampexcel Technologies is looking for Social Media Marketer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey     As a social media marketer, your role is to create and execute strategies to promote a brand, product, or service on various social media platforms     Your goal is to increase brand awareness, engage with the target audience, drive website traffic, and ultimately generate leads or sales     Here are some key responsibilities and tasks of a social media marketer:Strategy development: You'll work closely with the marketing team to define social media goals, target audience, and key performance indicators (KPIs)     You'll also identify the most appropriate social media platforms for the brand     Content creation: You'll create compelling and engaging content such as text posts, images, videos, and infographics to attract and engage the target audience     The content should align with the brand's voice and values     Social media management: You'll manage the brand's social media accounts, including scheduling and publishing posts, responding to comments and messages, and monitoring mentions and conversations about the brand     Community engagement: You'll actively engage with the brand's audience by responding to comments, messages, and mentions     Building a positive and interactive community around the brand is crucial for social media success     Social media advertising: You'll plan and execute paid advertising campaigns on social media platforms, targeting specific audience segments and optimizing ads for better performance     This may involve running sponsored posts, creating ad campaigns, and monitoring ad metrics

Awareness of at least general political, sociological, societal, or economical trends both domestically and internationally.      In-depth understanding of current events worldwide as they relate to corporate or government interests.      Able to track and address multiple conflicting assignments on a daily basis and within a 24/7 environment.     College degree or relevant work experience      Excellent writing and analytical skills to be utilized for analyzing suspect incidents and effectively communicate their existence to team members and management      Attention to detail and the ability to stay engaged during repetitive, detail-oriented tasks      Enhanced understanding of the intelligence cycle and how it pertains to real-world application. column2: Call to HR for Appointment @ Ms.   Komal Saxena : - 9758-000-279   (11am-5pm)     Job Description:  Globiva, a dynamic and leading outsourcing service provider, is seeking dedicated individuals to join our team as Customer Relationship Executives for multiple process at our Gurgaon location. This is a fantastic opportunity for both freshers and experienced candidates who possess excellent communication skills and a passion for customer service. Process:   RBL SOTC MMT Key Responsibilities:   Customer Interaction:  Engage with customers in a professional and courteous manner, addressing their queries and concerns, and providing solutions effectively. Documentation:  Maintain accurate and detailed records of customer interactions, transactions, and other relevant information. Product Knowledge : Stay informed about the process and related services to provide accurate information to customers. Problem Resolution:  Handle and resolve customer complaints, escalating issues when necessary to ensure a high level of customer satisfaction. Adherence to Policies:  Ensure compliance with company policies, procedures, and guidelines in all customer interactions. Team Collaboration:  Work collaboratively with team members and other departments to enhance overall customer experience. Education and Experience: High school diploma or equivalent 0-2 years of customer service or retail experience preferred Ability to effectively communicate in person, over the phone, and via email Skills and Abilities : Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Strong active listening and problem-solving abilities Patience and empathy when dealing with customer inquiries and concerns Familiarity with customer service software and databases Proficiency with basic computer programs like word processing and spreadsheets Ability to work well under pressure and meet deadlines Willingness to work in a fast-paced, customer-oriented environment Interview Process:  Face-to-face interviews will be conducted. The salary offered may vary based on the quality of the interview.  Compensation:   Up to 17,000 INR for fresher candidates Up to 25,000 INR for experienced candidates   Globiva is an equal opportunity employer, and we encourage candidates from diverse backgrounds to apply. Note: The salary mentioned are indicative and subject to change based on the interview performance and overall candidate evaluation

column1: Hiring For Customer Support Executive - Non voice
column2: Greetings from IntouchCX ! We are currently Hiring for  International Non Voice Process  |  Customer Service Associate   Contact HR Samuel 8147091053 The role of the  Customer Service Associate (CSA) - Non Voice , will be responsible for: Having daily interactions with the customer to handle issues from end to end via chat and Email Going the extra mile to engage customers in solving issues and ensuring satisfaction Quickly and effectively building rapport with customers while diagnosing and resolving issues Providing white glove service and having the ability to provide an overall excellent customer experience Managing customer expectations regarding estimated response times. Requirements :- An obligation to deliver exceptional customer service Receive inbound calls to gather and verify required information and do utmost within their power to solve customer problems Have excellent judgment skills to be able to properly evaluate situations and immediately by providing effective solutions Ability to learn new skills and quickly absorb and interpret new information, products, and features from the perspective of the customer Actively listen to the customer, and show empathy and patience Provide information to the client and place appropriate notes in system indicating exactly what action was taken or needs to be taken Ensure policies and procedures are followed on all calls Maintain thorough knowledge of systems so that information can be researched and proper information is given to customer Learn and retain a thorough working knowledge of all existing and new process and procedures Achieve assigned Key Performance Indicators e.g. Chat Quality, CSAT & DSAT Attend Team Meetings/additional training sessions as scheduled Performs other duties as assigned. Critical Skills:- Above average verbal and written communication skills - ability to speak accurately, using proper grammar, and good enunciation Ability to show high emotional intelligence by remaining calm under pressure while solving the customers concerns Ability to listen attentively and to use information provided by clients to tailor responses and actions to meet the clients specific needs Ability to learn new skills and quickly absorb and interpret new information, products, and features from the perspective of the customer Ability to work in a fast-paced, hectic, changing environment Ability to organize and follow-up multiple tasks/details with accuracy and timeliness Ability to operate a phone system and personal computer Ability to adhere to all organizational policies and procedures Ability to work a variety of shifts including days, afternoons, evenings, weekends and holidays Ability to perform basic mathematical functions Ability to effectively interact with employees at all levels of the organization and work with a variety of people from diverse backgrounds. Educational/Work Experience and Requirements Must successfully pass a background check High school diploma or equivalent required Post secondary degree is a plus Must have at least six months customer service experience or equivalent Benefits An attractive compensation package with performance-based incentives Incredible learning and growth opportunities Outstanding rewards and recognition program & employee engagement activities Free Food and Transport while working on-site Medical Insurance

column2: Business Development Executive   -   Job Details  Skills: Direct Sales  ,   Marketing  ,   Technical Sales  ,   IT  /  Software Sales  ,   Business Planning  ,   Client Relations  ,   Account Management.  Job Description  Dynamic Post Graduates having flair for sales of software   /   cutting edge technology product with prior exposure and talent to meet business targets through effective marketing selling skills. Having the ability to identify potential clients  ,   generating the leads  ,   manage existing customer relationships  ,   understanding the requirements of the clients  ,   providing an appropriate solution and closing the sales.    Post Graduate candidates who are willing to work in direct IT sales marketing   /   business development are preferred. Ability to uncover the key business pains for the customer. Confident and effective presentation skills. Exceptional interpersonal Time Management skills. Good organizational skills with ability to understand vital information. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Experience in achieving targets consistently.  Identifying potential clients in the market and initiating new business. Identifying potential business opportunities through existing clientele. Understanding the requirements of the customer and map it to our IT products. Ensuring customer satisfaction by achieving delivery and service quality norms  ,   building credibility  ,   gaining market share. Ability to manage the relationship at various levels of the clients. Liaising between the clients and internal teams for various concerns  ,   wherever required. Driving the Sales revenues achieving them.   Skills: Excellent communication and writing skills in English language  ,   Web content writing  ,    Editing Proof  -  reading  ,   Copywriting   Writing web content for websites   /   portals from scratch. Editing and proof reading content once written. Writing  ,   editing and proof reading copy for client projects based on the material supplied by them. Writing product descriptions  ,   brand support material etc. Proof reading  ,   editing and writing content on a regular basis for building up the website including informative short articles. Check web pages finally before making them live. Writing content for online magazines  ,   blogs article websites.  Skills: Candidates with basic Knowledge in Computers  ,   Website Software Development will be Preferred.   Accomplishes regional sales human resource objectives by recruiting  ,   orienting  ,   training  ,   assigning  ,   scheduling  ,   coaching  ,   counseling  ,   and disciplining employees in assigned districts. Achieves regional sales operational objectives by contributing regional sales information and recommendations to strategic plans and reviews; preparing and completing action plans; implementing production  ,   productivity  ,   quality  ,   and customer  -  service standards; resolving problems; completing audits; identifying trends; determining regional sales system improvements; implementing change. Meets regional sales financial objectives by forecasting requirements; preparing an annual budget; scheduling expenditures; analyzing variances; initiating corrective actions. Establishes sales objectives by creating a sales plan and quota for districts in support of national objectives. Maintains and expands customer base by counseling district sales representatives; building and maintaining rapport with key customers; identifying new customer opportunities. Implements trade promotions by publishing  ,   tracking  ,   and evaluating trade spending.

To support new customer on boarding     To deputise for the Senior Cash Analyst when the Senior Cash Analyst is not in the office acting as the first point of contact; resolving all issues and escalate as required. column2: About the Role: Associate- Content Research       We re looking for graduates/post-graduates for a full-time position for the role of a research associate for the Research and Curation Team. You need to love research and feel a personal stake in the future of science, design, technology, politics, philosophy, art, and/or pop culture. You need to excavate ideas that have the power to contribute and bring about an exponential change. You will be liaising with speakers and the team to build impactful talks that bring ideas to life.     We are looking for candidates with a sharp eye, an ear for language, boundless curiosity and an attitude of getting things done to assist in the day-to-day content research, speaker development, curation and speaker showcase/event activities.     You will be responsible for researching and reaching out to people with great ideas from across the world. Being a part of this team is an opportunity to meet and closely interact with some of the most dynamic change-makers in the world and help them build the talk of their lives.     You will be carrying forward the legacy of a team that has curated TEDxGateway talks for speakers like Sonam Wangchuk, Sudharak Olwe, Arunachalam Muruganantham, Sparsh Shah, which have garnered millions of views on YouTube alone.     This is a great position if youre: a spectacular researcher (and bonus if you can write well too) with incredible attention to detail; comfortable working in a fast-paced, collaborative environment with multiple team and speakers spread across the world; and passionate about TEDxGatewayss mission of spreading ideas.       Traits Required:       Shaper     Innovator     Implementer     Team worker     Finisher     Networker     Coordinator     Specialist       Kind of Team You ll Join:       Collaborative     Tight-knit     High-performing     Energetic       The Role Includes:       Research, pitch and discuss ideas for all TEDxGateway events to the team.     Research, document and reach out to changemakers and industry experts from different fields.     Report to the team lead, during every step of research, documentation, and coordination.     Work with speakers to help them present the most interesting ideas.     Work with the curator to make sure that TEDxGateway programs are consistently fascinating and have a strong content line-up     Work with speakers to ensure they deliver their talks for all TEDxGateway salons, sessions, and other TEDxGateway-related events.     Other duties and special projects as may be assigned from time to time.       Key Skills:       Must have a strong critical eye, express views and opinions that could lead to action, express ideas clearly and concisely     Must be able to organize, document and categorize ideas     Strong writing, editing and communication skills       Working Hours :       Office Timings- 10am to 7pm
column11: Publishing, PDF, Sales, Social media, Content writing, Creative writing, content marketing, Research, SEO, Content development

column2: As a Barclays Customer Service Representative in our Care Department, you will be delivering the highest standards of customer service and creating exceptional experiences by actively listening and establishing rapport with our customers. Customers are at the forefront of everything we do and ensuring customers concerns are addressed is vital to the success of Barclays. Were driving change to be the digital leader in the market, which means our customer service teams are more important than ever   What will you be doing? Handling customer queries effectively and efficiently. Understanding and analyzing customer needs. Listening actively and establishing rapport with our customers. Servicing Customers requirement through effective questioning and leveraging the tools and processes to service their need / requirement. Adhering to compliance regulations and security policies.   What were looking for: Should have 2-3 years of work experience in hospitality industry, preferably contact centre operations in customer service Effective communication, including Comprehension & questioning skills,  Ability to work independently or as part of a team. Achieving high standards and delivering results with accuracy and attention to detail. MS Office Applications  Ability to comprehend given set of instructions and apply the same for day to day transaction processing Flexibility to work in a 24 x 7 environment with variable shift patterns Graduate/Post-Graduate in any discipline  Excellent oral & Written communications skills Focus on the customer and a positive, professional attitude   Be More at Barclays At Barclays, each day is about being more as a professional, and as a person. Be More @ Barclays represents our core promise to all current and future employees. Its the characteristic that we want to be associated with as an employer, and at the heart of every employee experience. We empower our colleagues to Be More Globally Connected, working on international projects that improve the way millions of customers handle their finances. Be More Inspired by working alongside the most talented people in the industry, and delivering imaginative new solutions that are redefining the future of finance. Be More Impactful by having the opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects, and Be More Valued for who you are. Interested and want to know more about Barclays? Visit home.barclays/who-we-are/ for more details. Purpose, Values and Mindset We deploy finance responsibly to support people and businesses, acting with empathy and integrity, championing innovation and sustainability, for the common good and the long term. Our values underpin everything we do: Respect, Integrity, Service, Excellence and Stewardship.   Respect We harness the power of diversity and inclusion in our business, trust those we work with, and value everyone's contribution. Integrity We operate with honesty, transparency and fairness in all we do. Service We act with empathy and humility, putting the people and businesses we serve at the centre of what we do. Excellence We champion innovation, and use our energy, expertise and resources to make a positive difference. Stewardship We prize sustainability, and are passionate about leaving things better than we found them.

column2: ?     Once a contract has been awarded to our client, we help them mobilize it according to their requirement, from inputting data into the system in co-ordination with our onshore colleagues till the exaction phase. Our dedicated team is well trained and equipped to take care of beginning to end implementation and mobilization of such contract. With an in-house Contract Mobiliasation team we can aid our clients in setting up new contracts with ease. From inputting data into the system, co-ordinating with our onshore colleagues and preparing for an effortless exaction.       Contract Support Administration       Our highly experienced contract support team helps our client s contract managers in their day to day operations by being the central point of contact for contracts they manage. Our CSA (Customer Support Administrator) team acts as dedicated office based administrator who resolves day to day queries of the customers. Managing day to day queries for client s Contract Managers can be time consuming and tedious, with our highly skilled and organised Customer Support Administrator (CSA) we provide this unique service for our client thus freeing up crucial time for Contract Managers       Purchase Orders Management       Once the purchase orders have been issued to suppliers or third party contracts it is difficult to track and manage them, our dedicated team makes sure that once purchase order have been placed by our clients, we keep regular track of the same from getting ETA (Expected time of arrival) to completion. Purchase order management is vital for business growth and revenue, with our dedicated and trained team we can provide timely management of purchase order whether it is liaising with suppliers or third party we can manage it with regular follow ups and updates from inception to completion.       Work completion Feedback to customers       Our dedicated experienced team gathers feedback from technicians contractors to know the status of their assignments, take detail on the task carried out and sends detailed feedback to customers.       Chasing customers to get purchase orders       We have dedicated admin team who keeps track on all the quotations raised and issued in the system. This team takes regular follow up on all the quotations issued by our clients to their customers. Our team obtains update from customers via email and calls professionally to know their objectives to proceed with quotations/estimates and obtains purchase order from customers who help generating revenue to business.       Documents Formatting /Paperwork processing       Managing paperwork manually can be a laborious task but with our dedicated team we are able to collect all the documents received in via email from third party companies suppliers and process them into the CRM system.       Data Entry and management       A Data Entry role involves entering data from various sources into the company s data base system for processing and management. Our dedicated team members working in data entry efficiently manage a large amount of information that is often sensitive or confidential. The integrity of any company is based on the data they produce which validates the importance of the Data Entry position. Any information inputted by the Data Entry team will then be used by other people for reference or reports. We are fully aware of how crucial Data management can be for our clients, managed well, it can provide a critical edge over their competitors. With our attention to detail and meticulous data entry our team can ensure that edge is not lost for our clients. With strict adherence to Data Protection all the data and information is sensitively and confidentially managed.       Performance and Management reports       We have experienced team who helps our clients in preparing and formatting various performance reports as per their requirements in different platforms and applications as per business needs.     We also help our clients to prepare management reports for their board meetings.
column11: Order management, PPC, Data management, PHP, Customer support, Web designing, Windows, Back Office Administrator, Data entry, CRM

column2: , Bengaluru is inviting applications for internships from students enrolled in a recognized law program, early-career law graduates or early-career social science researchers with some grounding in legal studies.                  Interns will be hosted within a        Cluster on Public Policies and Chronic health Conditions        and work in the        DEEP        project. DEEP (Deciphering Epidemic of Epic Proportions: A Study on the Role of State and Tobacco Industry in Tobacco Control in Post-Liberalized India) is a long-term research project to better understand the political economy of tobacco in India. The internship will be for a minimum period of two months, during which the interns are expected to work in coordination with and under guidance from the DEEP project team in analyzing legislations and litigations with tobacco as the issue of concern. Interns will be compensated for any project related travelexpenses and might be eligible for a nominal stipend. The internship experience is expected to provide the candidates with the opportunity to:              Expand their understanding of the field of public health          Sharpen research skills, especially literature search, qualitative data analysis and writing          Interact with various public health and legal professionals who practice on issues associated with public health          Explore the possibilities of interdisciplinary research within a larger public health paradigm

About the Role:   As a Customer Support Associate  (Telugu)  at Niva Bupa, you will be the voice of our company, providing exceptional service to our valued customers. Your primary responsibilities will involve handling inbound and outbound calls, addressing inquiries, and cross-selling our products and services. Key Responsibilities: Handle inbound and outbound calls professionally, ensuring superior customer experience Respond to customer inquiries, concerns, and complaints regarding our health insurance products and services Cross-sell and promote relevant products and services to existing customers. Maintain accurate and up-to-date customer records in the CRM system Collaborate with internal teams to resolve complex issues and escalate cases when necessary Adhere to company policies, procedures, and regulatory guidelines Key Requirements: Excellent verbal and written communication skills in Telugu and English Experience in a customer support role is preferred, but fresh graduates are welcome to apply Ability to handle a high volume of calls while maintaining composure and professionalism Strong active listening and problem-solving skills Willingness to work in rotational shifts, including evening and weekend hours Basic computer proficiency and typing skills Positive attitude and commitment to providing outstanding customer service Education and Experience: Graduate or Postgraduate degree from a recognized university Prior experience in a customer-facing role is an advantage Age:  24 to 30 years Compensation : 3.0 to 3.5 LPA (Attractive incentives and benefits)   If you possess excellent communication skills, a customer-centric mindset, and a willingness to work in a dynamic environment, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity at Niva Bupa Health Insurance.

column2: Demand Generation/ Growth MarketerHyderabad,  India   Company  Role overviewBeautifulCode marketing team s charter is to drive growth and build a brand that delights customers. Our team is hard- driving,  fun- loving and low ego.   Are you an expert at Adwords,  Facebook,  and other self- serve paid traffic buying platforms Do you have experience writing headlines,  ad copy,  landing pages,  and funnels Do you understand the technology and know how to think like our customers who are Engineering Leaders    To be successful in this role you will need to be:   Scrappy. You aren t afraid to get creative,  hack solutions together and stretch a dollar as far as it can go   Data- Driven. You believe that the best way to demonstrate impact is through quantitative improvement   Focused. You see every element of a program to completion and in the right way   A builder. You understand how to grow,  optimize and add on to a digital marketing strategy   Organized. You excel at managing keywords,  landing pages,  links,  UTMs,  and conversion metrics in a system that s easy to reference and maintain   Responsibilities:   Develop innovative and creative marketing programs to drive outcomes that scale.   Drive awareness by identifying new tactics and channels to acquire leads.   Find opportunities for organic or viral acquisition whether that is collaborating with the founders,  sales or leveraging our CRM,  SEO,  viral giveaways,  etc   Optimizing the website to increase engagement and conversion with target account   Writing copy for funnels,  webinars,  and email followup sequences.   Report on KPIs, marketing performance with a focus on CAC,  ROI and customer growth -  adjust channel mix as necessary.Requirements:   2- 4+ years of experience in B2B growth or digital marketing creating impactful lead generation campaigns,  nurture programs,  optimizing funnel conversion and managing all digital programs including Performance -  SEM,  Social and Organic -  SEO,  content,  etc.   Experience with Marketo,  AutopilotHQ,  Demandbase,  Google Analytics,  and AdWords   Strong analytical skills   Excellent communication and presentation skills   Team player  Ability to work independently with minimal guidance

Ability to analyze problematic situations and find or propose appropriate solutions/alternatives   Generally digitally-savvy: comfortable with Skype (chat, audio, screen sharing), emails, Slack, etc.   High attention to detail with a personalized touch, ability to analyze customers needs and offer tailored solutions according to their business   Flexible on working hours and schedules   Must handle confidential information in a professional manner   Willing to work in a company aiming to help bigger causes humanitarian, social and ecological projects    Knowledge of the vacation rental, travel or tourism industries; desire to improve the vacation rental industry   Taste for adventure, entrepreneurship, curiosity, and strong motivation for this kind of activity         You are organized and rigorous: you are able to manage several projects in parallel and prioritize, you are excellent at execution, are result-oriented, and pay attention to details.         You are creative and resourceful in your ability to find solutions.         You are autonomous: with us, you cant be afraid to get your hands dirty!         You master and love modern tools and are comfortable with them (Hubspot, Clickfunnels, Webflow, Google Suite, Zapier...)         An interest in the world of short-term rental and coaching would be a big plus.

column1: Customer Support - Chat/Email - International BPO - 25k + Incentives!
column2: Job Description  POSITION: CUSTOMER SERVICE ASSOCIATE (CCE/SR.CCE)    The most fun-loving, and international customer service team in Noida is looking for top   class customer service professionals to service the customers.    EXCELLENT GROWTH AND LEARNING OPPORTUNITIES FOR CANDIDATES WHO TAKE   INITIATIVE. AMONGST THE FASTEST PROMOTIONS IN THE INDUSTRY FOR HIGH   PERFORMERS  About the Job : The job requires interacting with customers from around the world primarily   over  Chat and E-mails  to ensure all issues are resolved to customer's satisfaction.   The job requires you to understand the customer's problems accurately, follow the established   procedures to investigate and resolve the problem, and communicate with the customers.   As a Customer Service Executive, you will be dealing with our customers from around the   world. As a company, we take great pride in the level of customer service we deliver to the   customers. Therefore we hire only the best customer service, professionals.   Requirements : Excellent command over  written English Problem-solving and analytical skills Communication and interpersonal skills Ability to work in a high-pressure environment Typing speed - 35 wpm or more International Call Center experience is not required but will be an added plus Flexibility to work in a 24x7 environment Our office is located near Sector 15 Noida Metro Station, the candidate would have to commute themselves to work.   Why work with LiveSalesman Work with an established industry leader offering stability for over 15 years Work in a multicultural team, a workplace where people from all around the world collaborate in one office to share views and ideas. Meet people who speak different languages, eat different food, and wear different clothes.  Work on projects for companies that have changed the way people do things around the world. Our clients range from Start-ups which disrupt the market to established fortune 500 companies Learn a new skill - As a small company everyone multi-tasks, work on multiple projects. Every day will be a new learning experience GROW!!! - We prefer to not hire leaders and managers from outside the company. Capable and hardworking people will find their way to our leadership development program When we are not working - we are having fun, and when we are working, we are still having fun!     So come join the fun!  Some FAQ's:  Q: Are you a company or consultancy?  A: We are leading outsourcing company, serving some of the most successful e-businesses   around the world since 2003.  We are NOT a consultancy.  Q. What is the compensation you offer?  A. Compensation is decided on several factors, and determined after your interview.   Q. Do you provide transportation?  A. Our office is 1 minute away from Metro station, so most people do not require transportation.   On select case by case basic (based on shift timings etc.) we do offer transportation.  Q. What are the shift timings?  A. We are a 24x7 work environment, you should be open to work in shifts. Our shifts are planned   as such that you can safely commute using public transportation.  Q. Are there any incentives or perks?  A. We have loads of incentives, bonuses and perks.  If you don't have a Naukri account you can also apply online directly by visiting:   https://bit.ly/2QKaNRz or can email CV's on hr@lsmindia.com  This position is for Customer Service Associate / Sr. Customer Service Associates. This is the   international call center position for one of the largest and most successful e-businesses in the   world.  Perks and Benefits   ++ Bonus, Incentives, Mediclaim, Accidental Insurance     Address  LiveSalesman  A-72, Sector -2 Noida - 201301 (Near Sector 15 Metro Station)   Call : +91 9818944655
